::Kaiser::
       He sighs.  "Fine, and it will be a fine battle."  He smirks at 
Perceptor.  "I'll tell you what.  To make this fair you get to take the first 
shot.  Be warned.  If I am not dead or significantly unconscious you'd best 
flee quickly."  He glowers at Perceptor.  "I was once the greatest general 
the Tripredacus had ever known.  The only one to ever defeat me in single 
combat was he who replaced me.  And I assure you.  You are not him."

--part1_141.a1b59ed.2b787371_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
